post.text: It's time for Trump to answer serious questions about his ties to Russia. http://slate.me/2dWggCd

comment.author: Ryan
comment.text: Trump can have whatever he wants. He has no responsible toward transparency as a government employee does. Whoop-de-doo

replies.author: Destany
replies.text: I wonder if you or I did that what would happen to us?

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: Private individuals can have "secret servers". Government officials CANT
